kickstart.post:
# remove udev old network rules rm -f /etc/udev/rules.d/70-persistent-net.rules rm -f /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0 rm -f /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth1 chkconfig rocks-dynip on
hostlist=`rocks list host compute | tail -n +2 | awk -F: '{print $1}'` for h in $hostlist; do ssh $h rm -f /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0 ssh $h rm -f /etc/udev/rules.d/70-persistent-net.rules ssh $h yum install rocks-dynip-compute rocks-commands-dynip ssh $h chkconfig rocks-dynip on ssh $h chkconfig rocks-dynip-post on ssh $h service rocks-grub stop ssh $h chkconfig rocks-grub off done
